message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're getting closer. I can't go lower than $10,800. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to you.  Let's make this happen!
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. My counteroffer is $10,650 for the product.
Bob, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference this time?  I'm willing to go down to $10,725.  Let's make this deal happen!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $10,675 for the product.
